ValidationRule.description: Makes sure the Waiting field and Planned Care Pathway Match. Except in the case of helpline calls
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Waiting__c, 'Helpline Call')), TEXT(Waiting__c) != '', TEXT(Waiting__c) != TEXT(Type))
&& $Setup.rh2__PS_Settings__c.rh2__Run_Validation_Rule__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Waiting and Planned Care Pathway do not match
